newsitem.title: POLAND: NBP CUTS MAX 3-DAY REVREPO RATE TO 17.70 PCT.
newsitem.headline: NBP CUTS MAX 3-DAY REVREPO RATE TO 17.70 PCT.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland drained 2.956 billion zlotys from the market through a reverse NBP-bill repurchase auction after banks bid to place 3.951 billion with the central bank, the NBP said.

The bank drained the market for three days at a maximum rate of 17.70 percent, against 22.83 percent at the last three days auction on April 18, 1996 and 19.12 percent at the last 14-day auction on August 20, 1996.
